main event: One object round and pear shaped, color black, was observed emitting blue and yellow flames and leaving a trail two to three times its size.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 3 seconds., The object made two flame out events during observation., Witnesses noted no sound associated with the object's movement., Descriptions of the object's size were consistent among witnesses, estimated to be the size of a dime at arm's length., The conclusion drawn from the sighting is that it was likely a meteor.
sighted object: one round and pear shaped object, black in color
